answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Johnathan - I just did a Google search "county's with mayors" and pages of county's came up.  But I couldn't a single source listing all county's with mayors.
http://www.google.com/search?q=US+Counties+with+Mayors&oq=US+Counties+with+Mayors&sugexp=chrome,mod=8&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#hl=en&sugexp=les%3B&gs_rn=1&gs_ri=serp&pq=us%20counties%20with%20mayors&cp=0&gs_id=2&xhr=t&q=Counties%20with%20Mayors&pf=p&tbo=d&sclient=psy-ab&oq=Counties+with+Mayors&gs_l=&pbx=1&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.r_qf.&bvm=bv.1355534169,d.b2I&fp=edf8435073bcf94&bpcl=40096503&biw=1024&bih=655

author: Johnathan Gerber
text:
Hi,
Does anyone know or can hazard a guess as to where one can find out how many counties in the United States have a Mayor?
Thanks,
Johnathan
title: County Mayors
